description:

My friend that referred him to me said he was a bottom, and that his boyfriend was a top.
So I was eager to get him in first, as I am always a bit "top heavy" when it comes to what guys want to do. A local gay guy who bottoms? Get him in!
Turns out I had it backwards. He is kind of a bossy top, while his bf tends to wanna top too. His boyfriend is really cute, so after seeing him I was like, "Let's get him him in next!" Maybe we could do a video of them together, as Real Life couples can make for some steamy video action!
And steam is what you will get with Grant. Hot smoldering looks with a slow lingering jack-off style.
Pretty nice nut shot too! I think I will test out his cock sucking skills on one of the straight guys who want to be Serviced. But for today, you get up close and personal with him.
title: Grant - Solo
